filename: What is wrong child  Mtoto, shida ni nini.pdf
content:
What is wrong child?
 / Mtoto, shida ni nini?
 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English and Kiswahili
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Matende. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Huyu ni Matende. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Matende cried al the time. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Matende alilia kila wakati. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When his mother fed him, 
 
 Matende cried. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mamake alipomnywesha 
 
 maziwa, Matende alilia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When Matende was put 
 
 down to rest, he stil cried. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Matende alipowekwa 
 
 kupumzika, bado alilia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 When his mother changed 
 
 
 his napies, Matende 
 
 continued to cry. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mamake alipobadilisha 
 
 pampa, Matende 
 
 aliendelea kulia. 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 When his mother caried 
 
 
 him on her shoulder, 
 
 Matende cried more. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mamake alipombeba 
 
 begani, Matende alilia 
 
 zaidi. 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 When he fel aslep, 
 
 
 Matende loked like he 
 
 would start to cry again. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Alipopatwa na usingizi, 
 
 Matende alionekana kuwa 
 
 angenza kulia tena. 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 Matende's mother loked 
 
 
 at her son. 
 
 She did not know what was 
 
 wrong with him. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mamake Matende 
 
 alimwangalia mwanawe. 
 
 Hakujua kilichomsumbua. 
 
 
 
 
 8
